creator: Alexander Terp
description: Implement a new custom field type 'string-list' that allows freeform multi-value strings on cards. Unlike 'tags' which requires predefined options, string-list accepts arbitrary strings. This enables ad-hoc tagging/labeling without needing to pre-define valid values in board config. Referenced in SPEC.md as a planned future field type.
title: Add string-list custom field type
